turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like four pizzas, one pepperoni, one meat lover.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: one chicken bacon ranch and one

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pepperoni and bacon, extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size did you want those pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Medium, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 medium pizzas, one pepperoni, one meatlovers, one chicken bacon ranch, and one pepperoni and bacon with extra cheese, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I like those all thick crusts, too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me add that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $76, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be dining in, picking up, or having your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, please note that your total does not include tip.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be delivered within 40 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, sounds good. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that'll be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.
